showcase.name: GemDigest Bot
showcase.description: A Telegram bot that summarizes articles from any website into bite-sized nuggets.
showcase.longDescription: Simplify your reads, amplify your time! GemDigest is a Telegram bot that summarizes articles from any website into bite-sized nuggets, saving you time and energy for what matters most.
